CN.content:
Please identify the "Material Name" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: Cyclic voltammetry ( CV ) measurements were carried out to determine the HOMO and LUMO levels of the polymers.

Let's think step by step.

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Material name" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Material Name |
| --- |
| polymers |

The term "polymers" is the only clear material name entity in the paragraph. The other material name entities, such as "CV" (Cyclic Voltammetry) and "HOMO" (Highest Occupied Molecular Orbital) and "LUMO" (Lowest Unoccupied Molecular Orbital) are measurement techniques and energy levels, not materials.

Please identify the "Property Name" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Name". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: Cyclic voltammetry ( CV ) measurements were carried out to determine the HOMO and LUMO levels of the polymers.

Let's think step by step.

| Property Name |
| --- |
| Cyclic voltammetry (CV) |
| HOMO level |
| LUMO level |

In the given paragraph, the "Property Name" entities are:

1. Cyclic voltammetry (CV)
2. HOMO level
3. LUMO level

These entities are related to the properties or techniques used in the context of the paragraph.

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Material property" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Property Name |
| --- |
| HOMO level |
| LUMO level |

In the given paragraph, the "Material Property" entities are:

1. HOMO level
2. LUMO level

These entities are related to the properties of materials in the context of the paragraph. The other mentioned entity, Cyclic voltammetry (CV), is a technique or measurement method, not a material property.

PV.content:
Please identify the "Property Value" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Value". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: Cyclic voltammetry ( CV ) measurements were carried out to determine the HOMO and LUMO levels of the polymers.

Let's think step by step.

| Property Value |
| --- |
| HOMO levels |
| LUMO levels |

The "Property Value" entities in the paragraph are "HOMO levels" and "LUMO levels". These entities represent the highest occupied molecular orbital and the lowest unoccupied molecular orbital levels of the polymers, respectively.

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Value of material property" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Value".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Property Value |
| --- |
| HOMO levels |
| LUMO levels |

The valid "Property Value" entities in the paragraph are "HOMO levels" and "LUMO levels". These entities clearly refer to the values of material properties of the polymers. The other entities such as "Cyclic voltammetry (CV) measurements" and "polymers" are not property values, but rather methods and subjects of the measurement, respectively.
